<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the character at Pos from end of a string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="#a47fecf0b0acf65817de4695e97630cb6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a47fecf0b0acf65817de4695e97630cb6">charTailAt</a>(<a href="#a5579082361e207dbd7431e043b1b1cdc">StringPair</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pos) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;first.val();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pos &gt;= S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)S&#91;S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() - Pos - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Three-way radix quicksort. This is much faster than std::sort with strcmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because it does not compare characters that we already know the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="#a9ee0fea813b095ebe4fc342a4b3c4b53"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a9ee0fea813b095ebe4fc342a4b3c4b53">multikeySort</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;StringPair &#42;&gt;</a> Vec, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pos) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">tailcall:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Partition items so that items in &#91;0, I) are greater than the pivot,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;I, J) are the same as the pivot, and &#91;J, Vec.size()) are less than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pivot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pivot = <a href="#a47fecf0b0acf65817de4695e97630cb6">charTailAt</a>(Vec&#91;0&#93;, Pos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> K = 1; K &lt; J;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="#a47fecf0b0acf65817de4695e97630cb6">charTailAt</a>(Vec&#91;K&#93;, Pos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &gt; Pivot)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Vec&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++&#93;, Vec&#91;K++&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> &lt; Pivot)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Vec&#91;--J&#93;, Vec&#91;K&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      K++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a9ee0fea813b095ebe4fc342a4b3c4b53">multikeySort</a>(Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), Pos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a9ee0fea813b095ebe4fc342a4b3c4b53">multikeySort</a>(Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(J), Pos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multikeySort(Vec.slice(I, J - I), Pos + 1), but with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tail call optimization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pivot != -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Vec = Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, J - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++Pos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">goto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tailcall;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Previous.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#aca439bf65258d9d8d057812938b617c5">ends&#95;with</a>(S)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>-&gt;second = Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Size += S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa7276fc7b95014e9041e70e8d0bfcdc3d">RAW</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Previous = S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aad9c26952cc8eda5313843bab92a4b47c">MachO</a> || K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa9ab9fedf71c77844b4a749845cd82e06">MachOLinked</a> || K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa195bde7c1cb7c6635198f26a25801ab6">DXContainer</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Size = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Size, 4); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pad to multiple of 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aad1181b7fcf315dfde97a58d1a158b2e1">MachO64</a> || K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa24f103126892bfe4a4889575005e5837">MachO64Linked</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Size = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Size, 8); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pad to multiple of 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// According to ld64 the string table of a final linked Mach-O binary starts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with &quot; &quot;, i.e. the first byte is &#39; &#39; and the second byte is zero. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;initSize()&#39; we reserved the first two bytes for holding this string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa9ab9fedf71c77844b4a749845cd82e06">MachOLinked</a> || K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aa24f103126892bfe4a4889575005e5837">MachO64Linked</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StringIndexMap&#91;CachedHashStringRef(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first byte in an ELF string table must be null, according to the ELF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specification. In &#39;initSize()&#39; we reserved the first byte to hold null for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this purpose and here we actually add the string to allow &#39;getOffset()&#39; to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be called on an empty string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtablebuilder/#a58c8b5f09afd8827aed05c9a1804e73aadb97a5bc1bb9ee2bc8b2dbb9065755f5">ELF</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StringIndexMap&#91;CachedHashStringRef(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
